characters.name: John
characters.description: The narrator's husband, a practical physician who does not believe the narrator is sick.

characters.name: Narrator
characters.description: The protagonist of the story, suffering from a nervous condition and confined to a room with yellow wallpaper.

characters.name: Narrator's brother
characters.description: A physician of high standing who agrees with John's diagnosis.

characters.name: Mary
characters.description: A caretaker who is good with the baby.

characters.name: Jennie
characters.description: John's sister, a careful and enthusiastic housekeeper.

characters.name: Cousin Henry
characters.description: A cousin mentioned as a potential visitor.

characters.name: Julia
characters.description: A cousin mentioned as a potential visitor.

characters.name: Weir Mitchell
characters.description: A physician known for treating nervous conditions, mentioned as a potential doctor for the narrator.

characters.name: Nellie
characters.description: A family member who visits with the mother and children.

characters.name: Mother
characters.description: The narrator's mother, who visits with Nellie and the children.

characters.name: Jane
characters.description: Mentioned at the end, possibly an alternate name or identity for the narrator.

characters.name: The woman behind the wallpaper
characters.description: A figure the narrator perceives behind the wallpaper, symbolizing her own entrapment.
